answers.answer: How far along are you?  I'm 16 weeks and I haven't done that test yet

For me honestly I loved it. I haven't drank any soda scince I got pregnant and that tasted like sun kiss soda. I downed in in like 2 minutes. So many people said it was nasty and too much sugar but not for me I loved it. Guess it just depends if u like ALOT of sugar.
When ur 25-28 weeks so u still got some weeks to go
I hated it. But that's just me. I was sick to my tummy after I drank it.
It made me sick so I had to drink it again. To me it was nasty but bearable.  Good luck!
I'm 25 weeks I did my first one at 8 weeks and my second one at 25 the drink isn't the best tasting

To me it was very nasty!  I picked the orange one,  never drank orange soda since... can't even look at it cause it reminds me of it...but if you like sugary drinks like fruity sodas than you'll probably be ok!
I thought it was horrible and made me feel horrible I had the one that tasted like sprite
I did mine today last day of being 24wks and I was worried it was nasty but it wasn't I had fruit punch
Mine was the orange drink and it made me feel so sick i hated it!
Mines was super cold which made it good to me

Some people like it some people hate it lol it didn't bother me and you drink it and then get a blood test to find out whether or not you have gestational diabetes or not. I've had the orange one and the lemonade one I'd say pick the orange one if you get a choice.

question: So my next appointment which is in 4 weeks I have to stay an hour at the hospital to take the sugar test. Is the drinknasty or good & what is it for?
title: sugar test...
